title: Bio-Titanium Spinal Implant
description: Custom patient-specific spinal cage with trabecular structure for enhanced osseointegration.
details: This spinal implant features a porosity gradient designed to match human bone density, promoting faster healing and integration. Manufactured using DMLS technology with Grade 23 Titanium.

title: Voronoi Golden Visage
description: Large-scale artistic installation exploring mathematical beauty through parametric design.
details: A 2-meter tall sculpture printed in sections using Silk Gold PLA. The voronoi pattern minimizes material usage while maintaining structural integrity and creating stunning shadow plays.

title: Interactive DNA Kit
description: Modular, magnetic molecular modeling kit for university-level biochemistry education.
details: Designed to help students visualize complex molecular bonds. Parts are printed in durable Nylon 12 and click together with satisfying haptic feedback using embedded magnets.

title: Drone Fuselage Prototype
description: Aerodynamic drone chassis optimized for weight and strength using carbon-fiber composites.
details: Rapid prototyping of a racing drone frame. The carbon-fiber reinforced nylon creates an incredibly stiff yet lightweight structure, perfect for high-speed flight maneuvers.
